title: CarrionTrooper's Sketchbook
content:
[[>]]
[[module Rate]]
[[/>]]

These are sketches found scattered on Agent CarrionTrooper's desk.

[[include component:image-block name=badasskondraki.jpg|caption=A sketch of what appears to be the decomissioning of [[[decomm:scp-083-d]]].|width=600px|align=left]]

[[include component:image-block name=DoctorBright.jpg|caption=A sketch of Doctor Bright, in an orangutan body.|align=left]]

[[include component:image-block name=BreakSnorTentacles.jpg|caption=A sketch of Doctor Snorlison and his secretary Break, during an investigation in a dimensional rift. Complete documentation could be found in [CLASSIFIED].|width=600px|align=left]]

~~~~~
